name: Spellcasting Contract
book: Pathfinder 29: Mother of Flies. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like lesser spellcasting contract, except if the target has 9 HD or more, you can imbue him with one or two 2nd- level spells and one 3rd-level spell.
text_zh: 这个法术的作用类似于“次级法术契约”，如果目标拥有9HD以上生命骰，你可以向他灌输一到两个2环和一个3环法术。
